definition[0]: a thin pointed piece of metal that you push and turn in order to fasten pieces of metal or wood together
example[0]: Fix the frame in position and tighten the screws.
definition[1]: an offensive word meaning an act of having sex
definition[2]: a very offensive word for someone who is good at having sex
definition[3]: a prison officer â€“ used especially by prisoners
definition[4]: to attach one thing to another using a screw
example[1]: The chairs were screwed to the floor.
example[2]: The wooden frame should be screwed onto the wall.
definition[5]: to fasten or close something by turning it, or to be fastened in this way
example[3]: The lens screws onto the front of the camera.
example[4]: She carefully screwed the cap back onto the toothpaste.
definition[6]: to twist paper or cloth into a small round shape
example[5]: She screwed the letter up and threw it in the bin.
example[6]: I screwed my handkerchief into a ball.
definition[7]: an offensive word meaning to have sex with someone
definition[8]: to cheat someone in order to get money from them
example[7]: They screwed us for $60 in the end.
